scripts.start: npm run init-db && npx nodemon --exec babel-node server.js
scripts.sequelize-skeleton: npx sequelize init:models; npx sequelize init:config
scripts.init-db: cd ../../../../../opt/homebrew/bin/ &&  echo 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS db_express_sequelize_server; CREATE DATABASE db_express_sequelize_server CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci' | ./mysql -u root && cd -
